top_stories.title: Blackstone backs Neysa in up to $1.2B financing as India pushes to build domestic AI infrastructure
top_stories.description: Neysa is targeting deployments of more than 20,000 GPUs over time as demand for local AI compute accelerates.
top_stories.author: Jagmeet Singh
top_stories.content: Neysa is targeting deployments of more than 20,000 GPUs over time as demand for local AI compute accelerates.

top_stories.title: Structured outputs on Amazon Bedrock: Schema-compliant AI responses
top_stories.description: Today, we're announcing structured outputs on Amazon Bedrock—a capability that fundamentally transforms how you can obtain validated JSON responses from foundation models through constrained decoding for schema compliance. In this post, we explore the challenges of traditional JSON generation and how structured outputs solves them. We cover the two core mechanisms—JSON Schema output format and strict tool use—along with implementation details, best practices, and practical code examples.
top_stories.author: Jeffrey Zeng
top_stories.content: Today, we're announcing structured outputs on Amazon Bedrock—a capability that fundamentally transforms how you can obtain validated JSON responses from foundation models through constrained decoding for schema compliance. In this post, we explore the challenges of traditional JSON generation and how structured outputs solves them. We cover the two core mechanisms—JSON Schema output format and strict tool use—along with implementation details, best practices, and practical code examples.

top_stories.title: Build long-running MCP servers on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore with Strands Agents integration
top_stories.description: In this post, we provide you with a comprehensive approach to achieve this. First, we introduce a context message strategy that maintains continuous communication between servers and clients during extended operations. Next, we develop an asynchronous task management framework that allows your AI agents to initiate long-running processes without blocking other operations. Finally, we demonstrate how to bring these strategies together with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands Agents to build...
top_stories.author: Haochen Xie
top_stories.content: In this post, we provide you with a comprehensive approach to achieve this. top_stories.title: Minister Lloyd speech at techUK Future Telecoms Conference 2026
top_stories.description: Liz Lloyd, Minister for the Digital Economy, spoke to techUK Future Telecoms Conference 2026 on 10 February 2026.
top_stories.content: Liz Lloyd, Minister for the Digital Economy, spoke to techUK Future Telecoms Conference 2026 on 10 February 2026.

top_stories.title: Enhanced storage resiliency with Azure NetApp Files Elastic zone-redundant service
top_stories.description: Data resiliency is no longer optional—it is the foundation that keeps mission‑critical applications running, teams productive, and compliance intact. Organizations must ensure continuous data availability and zero data loss to meet stringent regulatory and audit standards. The post Enhanced storage resiliency with Azure NetApp Files Elastic zone-redundant service appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
top_stories.author: Raji Easwaran
top_stories.content: Data resiliency is no longer optional—it is the foundation that keeps mission‑critical applications running, teams productive, and compliance intact.
